data.title: NAB 2024 Marconi Radio Awards
data.meta_description: The NAB Marconi Radio Awards were established in 1989 and named after inventor and Nobel Prize winner Guglielmo Marconi. These prestigious awards recognize stations and individuals for their excellence and performance in radio.
data.text:
